info.description: This is a Phone.com api Swagger definition
info.title: Phone.com API

tags.name: account
tags.description: This service allows you to interact with your accounts

tags.name: extensions
tags.description: This services allows you to interact with your account extensions.

tags.name: subaccount
tags.description: This services allows you to interact with your subaccounts.

tags.name: call-logs
tags.description: The Call Logs API returns a list of call detail records for the account.

tags.name: schedule
tags.description: Schedules are used at various places in your Phone.com account.

get.summary: Get a list of accounts visible to the authenticated user or client
get.description: This service lists the accounts accessible to the authenticated client. In most cases, there will only be one such account

get.summary: Get a list of SMS messages for an account

parameters.name: sort[created_at]
parameters.description: Sort by created time of message

post.summary: Send a SMS to one or a group of recipients

get.summary: Show details of an individual SMS
Get a list of extensions visible to the authenticated user or client
Show details of an individual extension
Get a list of subaccounts for the authenticated user or client
get.description: This service lists the Subaccount of the authenticated client. In most cases, there will not be any.

post.summary: Add a subaccount for the authenticated user or client
post.description: This service shows the details of an individual Subaccount.

get.summary: Get a list of call details associated with your account
get.description: This service lists the call logs for a given account.

parameters.name: filters[direction]
parameters.description: Call direction filter: in or out

parameters.name: sort[start_time]
parameters.description: Sorting by call start time: asc or desc

parameters.name: sort[created_at]
parameters.description: Sorting by call log creation time: asc or desc

get.summary: Show details of an individual schedule
get.description: This service shows the details of an individual schedule.

get.summary: Get a list of schedules for an account
get.description: This service gives access to all Schedules for an Account.

voicemail[greeting][enable_leave_message.description: Enable the "leave a message" prompt for voicemail

voicemail[notifications][emails].description: Email notifications for voicemails. Can be a single email or an array of emails //type: mixed

call_notifications[emails].description: Email notifications for calls. Can be a single email or an array of emails  //type: mixed

voicemail[greeting][enable_leave_message.description: Use leave message prompt after voicemail

voicemail[notifications][emails].description: Email notifications for voicemails. Can be a single email or an array of emails //type: mixed

call_notifications[emails].description: Email notifications for calls. Can be a single email or an array of emails //type: mixed

route.description: Route object lookup (must belong to this extension) //type: mixed
